list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thin piece of metal with a sharp point at one end and a round head at the other, used especially for fastening pieces of cloth.
a metal projection from a plug or an integrated circuit which makes an electrical connection with a socket or another part of a circuit.
a stick with a flag placed in a hole to mark the hole's position.
(in bowling) one of a set of bottle-shaped wooden pieces that are arranged in an upright position at the end of a lane in order to be toppled by a rolling ball.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she was very nimble on her pins
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy rất nhanh nhẹn trên chân của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an attack on a piece or pawn which is thereby pinned.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the pin of the black queen by the white rook
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ghim của nữ hoàng màu đen của tân binh trắng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an identifying number allocated to an individual by a bank or other organization and used for validating electronic transactions.
attach or fasten with a pin or pins in a specified position.
